definition: to show the image of sb/sth on the surface of sth such as a mirror, water or glass.
example: His face was reflected in the mirror.

definition: to think carefully and deeply about sth.
example: She was left to reflect on the implications of her decision.

definition: to say numbers in the correct order.
example: She can count up to 10 in Italian.

definition: to calculate the total number of people, things, etc. in a particular group.
example: She began to count up how many guests they had to invite.

definition: to include sb/sth when you calculate a total.
example: We have invited 50 people, not counting the children.

definition: to take in a liquid, gas or other substance from the surface or space around.
example: This cream is easily absorbed into the skin.

definition: to take sth into the mind and learn or understand it. SYN take in.
example: It's a lot of information to absorb all at once.

definition: a thing that you do to help sb.
example: Could you do me a favour and pick up Sam from school today?

definition: (formal) to suggest a plan, an idea, etc. for people to think about and decide on.
example: He proposed changing the name of the company.
persian: پیشنهاد کردن، طرح کردن (طرح یا ایده)

definition: the conditions and facts that are connected with and affect a situation, an event or an action.
example: The company reserves the right to cancel this agreement in certain circumstances.

definition: action expressing shame.
action expressing anticipation or nervousness.
action expressing agreement.
action expressing inquiry or surprise.
persian: ابرو بالا انداختن (از تعجب یا پرسش)

definition: action expressing doubt or indifference.
persian: شانه بالا انداختن (از بی‌تفاوتی یا تردید)

definition: action expressing anger.
making a certain situation or outcome likely or possible; helpful.
example: Exercise is conducive to good health.

definition: filled with or likely to result in (something undesirable).
example: The air was fraught with tension.

definition: entirely lacking or free from.
example: The area is almost devoid of vegetation.

definition: protected against a specific disease or exempt from something unpleasant.
example: He seems immune to criticism.

definition: wrongly think that sb/sth is sb/sth else.
example: I mistook her for a friend.
persian: اشتباه گرفتن کسی/چیزی با کس/چیز دیگر

definition: be very good at sth.
example: The university excels at/in sciences.

definition: complete the last part of a plan/an arrangement.
example: I haven't finalized my plans.

definition: having no purpose.
example: The exercise was completely pointless.

definition: a group of supporters.
example: Chelsea have a large following in Asia.

definition: buildings for people to live in.
example: We need more family housing.

definition: showing no kindness or consideration. SYN cruel.
example: It was a heartless thing to say.

definition: the way sb deals with sth/sb.
example: The situation needs careful handling.

definition: causing people to have strong emotions.
example: Cancer is a very emotive subject.

definition: showing you are sorry.
example: It's his fault and he's very apologetic.

definition: so bad it cannot be forgiven. SYN inexcusable.
example: His behaviour was unforgivable.

definition: so extreme it is impossible to describe.
example: The pain in my arm was indescribable.

definition: easily noticed.
example: The scar on his face is quite noticeable.

definition: (of a price or cost) including everything.
example: Bed and breakfast is £80, fully inclusive.

definition: similar; able to be compared.
example: Are there comparable figures for last year?

definition: having a good reputation; known to be good.
example: It's a very reputable company, so you should be OK.

definition: put furniture in a place.
example: Are they going to furnish the flats?

definition: containing furniture. OPP unfurnished.
example: One is fully furnished already.

definition: not containing furniture.
example: the other will be unfurnished.

definition: full of interesting or important things that happen. OPP uneventful.
example: I hear you had a very eventful trip in China.

definition: that cannot be explained.
example: His behaviour was inexplicable.

definition: acceptance that sth is true or legal.
example: There is a growing recognition that we can't go on polluting the atmosphere.

definition: important, interesting, etc.
example: I thought the meeting was very worthwhile.

definition: without value.
example: The necklace is worthless.

definition: deserving (to win/be respected).
example: He's a worthy champion.

definition: fill or use a space, area, or amount of time. occupied ADJ.
example: She keeps herself occupied with work.

definition: admit formally that you have done sth wrong or illegal. confession N.
example: He eventually made a confession.

definition: promise to do sth that requires time and loyalty. commitment N.
example: No, he just can't make a commitment.

definition: the cause of sth, or the place where it starts to exist. originate v.
example: Nobody knows where it originated.

definition: tell sb that sth is definitely true or definitely going to happen. assurance N.
example: He gave us his full assurance.

definition: make sth easier to do or understand. simplification N.
example: we need a simplification of the rules.

definition: treat sb in a cruel or violent way, often sexually. abuse N.
example: He suffered physical abuse as a child.

definition: protect sb or yourself. defenceless ADJ.
example: No, I was completely defenceless.

definition: extremely bad or serious. severity N.
example: We don't know the severity of them yet.

definition: show that sth exists or is likely to be true. indication N.
example: Well, it gives some indication of progress.

definition: (of babies, puppies, etc.) pretty and attractive.
example: My niece Keira's so cute.

definition: slightly fat, but in an attractive way (chubby cheeks/fingers).
example: She's got chubby cheeks and huge blue eyes.

definition: INF very beautiful and attractive. SYN lovely.
example: My sister has a gorgeous figure.

definition: show sth you are proud of.
example: she shows it off at every opportunity.

definition: a fat stomach on a man.
example: My uncle's got a paunch which really sticks out.

definition: 1 be or push out further than sth else. 2 be noticeable.
example: My uncle's got a paunch which really sticks out.

word: be getting on for sth (PHR V)
definition: be nearly a particular age, time, or number.
example: Gran's getting on for 80.

definition: (especially of an old person) physically weak and thin. frailty N.
example: looks a bit frail.

definition: walks slowly and shakily because they are frail.
example: doddery walks slowly and shakily

definition: to make straight (form from straight + -en).
example: a brace to straighten her teeth.

definition: the thing that makes you able to understand or achieve sth. SYN the secret of sth.
example: The key to dressing for your body shape is to enhance your best features.
persian: کلید، رمز اصلی (برای دستیابی به چیزی)

definition: increase or improve the quality, value, or status of sth.
example: The key to dressing for your body shape is to enhance your best features.

definition: a part of sb's face or body.
example: enhance your best features

definition: in a way that others will not notice. discreet ADJ. OPP indiscreet.
example: discreetly conceal the not-so-good ones.

definition: FML hide sth.
example: discreetly conceal the not-so-good ones.

definition: information that can help you, e.g. to make a decision.
example: Here are a few guidelines.

definition: make sth which is false appear true.
example: vertical stripes will create the illusion of being slimmer.

definition: making sb look more attractive. OPP unflattering.
example: high heels are flattering

definition: make sth seem bigger, better, worse, or more important than it really is. exaggeration N.
example: flattering because they exaggerate the length of the legs.

definition: to make someone notice something.
example: jeans that sit below the waist are flattering, as they draw attention to the waistline.

definition: Do sth to make the waiter notice you.
example: Attract the waiter's attention.

definition: He never listens to or considers what I say.
example: He never pays attention to me.
persian: توجه کردن به، دقت کردن به

definition: make a decision about sth too quickly, before you have thought about all the facts. SYN leap to conclusions.
example: if you jump to conclusions...

definition: a body movement you make to show a particular meaning.
example: interpret a particular gesture

definition: If you misinterpret sth. you understand it wrongly.
example: you may misinterpret what it means.

definition: the action or moment of looking into another person's eyes.
example: avoid eye contact

definition: used to say that sth is possibly true but is not always true.
example: may not necessarily be lying

definition: FML see or notice sth; an observant person is good at noticing things. observation N.
example: we need to observe a combination of behaviour

definition: a mix of two or more things. combine v.
example: observe a combination of behaviour

definition: show signs of sth, often a quality or a feeling. display N.
example: a combination of behaviour that a person displays.

definition: look and try to see or find sth/sb.
example: look out for any or all of these
persian: مراقب چیزی/کسی بودن، دنبال چیزی گشتن

definition: become red in the face, often when you're angry or embarrassed.
example: going red

definition: If you sweat, water appears on the surface of your skin because you are hot. SYN perspire FML.
example: sweating a lot

definition: more than is reasonable or necessary. excess N. exceed v.
example: excessive hand gestures.

definition: remember to consider sth.
example: bear in mind the danger of making generalizations
persian: در نظر داشتن، به خاطر سپردن

definition: make general statements about sth that may only be based on a few examples. generalize v.
example: making generalizations about body language

definition: suggest that you feel or think sth without saying so directly. implication N.
example: folded arms may imply stubbornness.

definition: a determination not to change your opinion or attitude. SYN obstinacy.
example: folded arms may imply stubbornness.

definition: INF be attracted to sb.
example: Women who fancy someone
persian: کسی را دوست داشتن، از کسی خوش آمدن (جذب شدن)

definition: keep moving or touching sth with your hands.
example: Women often fiddle with their hair
persian: ور رفتن با چیزی، دستکاری کردن

definition: move your hand or fingers gently over the surface of sth.
example: men stroke an earlobe.

definition: behave towards sb as if you find them sexually attractive, but not in a serious way.
example: neck when they're flirting.

definition: move slowly and quietly so you are not seen or heard. (also tiptoe).
example: I crept up the stairs, so that I wouldn't wake anyone.

definition: walk casually for pleasure.
example: We strolled along the beach.

definition: walk slowly and with difficulty because one leg or foot is injured.
example: He limped quite badly after his accident.

definition: walk with difficulty, being almost unable to stand up.
example: he staggered to the nearest house and phoned for help.

definition: walk long distances in the country.
example: They hiked across the countryside.

definition: walk with stiff regular steps.
example: The soldiers marched for over 20 kms.
persian: رژه رفتن، با قدم‌های منظم راه رفتن

definition: run, drive, etc. after sb/sth to catch them.
example: Police chased the man for miles.

definition: run quickly and suddenly.
example: I dashed across the road for the bus.

definition: (of a horse or rider) run quickly.
example: The horse galloped across the field.

definition: move quickly in a particular direction, often to attack sb/sth.
example: An angry section of the crowd charged towards the security men.

definition: a period of physical exercise you do to keep fit. work out v.
example: My 20-minute workout

definition: able to bend and move parts of your body easily.
example: I'm not as supple or agile as I used to be.

definition: able to move quickly and easily. agility N.
example: I'm not as supple or agile as I used to be.

definition: feeling some pain and unable to move easily. stiffness N.
example: I was beginning to feel quite stiff and sluggish.

definition: moving slowly, below your normal activity level. sluggishness N.
example: I was beginning to feel quite stiff and sluggish.

definition: invent a method or plan of doing sth. SYN think sth up.
example: asked a friend to devise a workout routine.

definition: do physical activities to prepare the muscles for exercise. SYN warm up.
example: First I loosen up with some stretching.
persian: بدن را گرم کردن، نرمش کردن

definition: lean over at the waist (also bend your knee, elbow, etc.).
example: bending

definition: needing effort and energy. SYN arduous.
example: then I go on to something more strenuous.

definition: A thing that is relentless never seems to stop or get any easier.
example: I find them relentless.

definition: happening or appearing again and again. recur v.
example: I also have a recurrent elbow problem.

definition: do A. then B, then do A again, and so on.
example: I prefer to alternate between jogging and sprinting
persian: بین دو چیز متناوب عمل کردن

definition: run a short distance very fast.
example: alternate between jogging and sprinting

definition: happening all the time or a lot of the time.
example: There were constant interruptions.

definition: make or cause sth to make short, loud sounds. rattle N.
example: The windows rattled in the wind

definition: a long, deep sound or series of sounds. rumble v.
example: a distant rumble of thunder.

definition: make or cause sth to make a noise like paper, leaves, etc. rubbing together. rustle N.
example: Trees rustled

definition: (of a liquid) fall onto sth in large drops and make it wet. splash N.
example: big raindrops splashed onto the windows.

definition: If a car horn beeps it makes a short high or loud sound. beep N.
example: someone beeped their horn

definition: a loud, high, unpleasant sound. screech v.
example: a screech of brakes.

definition: shut sth with a lot of force so that it makes a loud noise.
example: Someone slammed the car door shut.

definition: make a wet, sucking sound, e.g. when you walk through mud.
example: footsteps squelched through the mud
persian: صدای چلپ و چلوپ کردن (در گل)

definition: make the sound that an old door or floor makes. creak N.
example: a floorboard on the stairs creaked

definition: (of sounds) very high in the register of sound. OPP low-pitched.
example: a high-pitched scream

definition: (dogs) make a short loud sound. (Human behavior: boss's bark is worse than his bite = He's not really as angry or aggressive as he sounds.)
example: My boss's bark is worse than his bite.

definition: (wolves) make a long loud cry. (Human behavior: howling in pain, howled with laughter.)
example: The audience howled with laughter.
persian: زوزه کشیدن (گرگ)، با صدای بلند گریه/خندیدن

definition: (dogs) make a deep, angry sound. (Human behavior: said in a low, angry voice. SYN snarl.)
example: 'What are you doing here?' he growled.
persian: غرولند کردن (سگ)، با صدای خشمگین حرف زدن

definition: (bees) make a continuous low sound. (Human behavior: head was buzzing = thinking about it continuously, buzzing about = moving around continuously.)
example: I was buzzing about all day.
persian: وِزوِز کردن (زنبور)، فکر در سر چرخیدن

definition: (lions) make a very loud deep sound. (Human behavior: a huge roar when Drogba scored, roared with laughter.)
example: We roared with laughter.

definition: (mice) make a short high but not loud sound. (Human behavior: squeaked down the phone = spoke in a high-pitched, excited voice. squeaky ADJ.)
example: 'I've won the cup!' she squeaked down the phone.
persian: جیرجیر کردن (موش)، با صدای زیر هیجان‌زده صحبت کردن

definition: (cocks) make repeated loud sounds especially in the morning. (Human behavior: crowing about = talking too proudly about. SYN boast.)
example: He was crowing about his victory all night.
persian: قوقولی‌قوقو کردن (خروس)، لاف زدن (با غرور حرف زدن)

definition: (owls) make a long 'oo' sound. (Human behavior: hooted at me = sounded her car horn, hots of derision.)
example: There were hoots of derision from the audience.
persian: هو کردن (جغد)، بوق زدن (ماشین)، هو کردن (تمسخر)

definition: the ability to see. SYN sight.
example: poor eyesight.

definition: a slight pain in your eyes, e.g. from reading a lot.
example: eye strain is a common complaint.

definition: a feeling of slight pain.
example: discomfort is a common complaint.

definition: If your vision is blurred you cannot see clearly.
example: blurred vision are common complaints.

definition: shut and open your eyes quickly.
example: blink often to keep your eyes moist.

definition: a drop of liquid that comes out of your eye when you cry.
example: poor tear production

definition: painful, red, or swollen. irritation N.
example: dry, irritated eyes.

definition: make sth less unpleasant or painful. SYN alleviate sth.
example: ease your discomfort

definition: change sth slightly to make it more suitable. adjustment N.
example: adjust your computer screen

definition: remove or get rid of sth. elimination N.
example: eliminate glare

definition: a bright, unpleasant light.
example: adjust lighting to eliminate glare

definition: slightly wet, often in a way that is useful or pleasant.
example: keep your eyes moist

definition: only able to see things if they are near you. OPP long-sighted.
A person who can see very little.
example: A partially sighted person can see very little.

definition: look at sth for a long time because you are interested in it or are thinking about sth else. gaze N.
example: gazing at the breathtaking view below.
persian: خیره شدن، با دقت نگاه کردن

definition: very impressive. SYN spectacular.
example: gazing at the breathtaking view below.

definition: only with great difficulty or effort. SYN only just.
example: the port was barely visible

definition: A thing that is visible can be seen. OPP invisible.
example: the port was barely visible

definition: smoke, dust, or mist in the air which is hard to see through. hazy ADJ.
example: through the early morning haze.

definition: see, hear, or understand sth/sb with difficulty.
example: we could just make out the island.

definition: appear. OPP disappear from view/sight.
example: a deer came into view
persian: در معرض دید قرار گرفتن، پدیدار شدن

definition: stand without moving (also keep/stay/sit still).
example: They stood completely still

definition: look at sb/sth carefully or because you are suspicious of them/it.
example: eyeing us warily
persian: زیر نظر گرفتن، نگاه کردن (با سوءظن)

definition: carefully, because you think there may be danger or a problem.
example: eyeing us warily

definition: disappear suddenly or in a way you cannot explain.
example: ran off and vanished into thin air.

definition: to see them for a very short time and not clearly or completely.
example: We caught a glimpse of the actress.

definition: to see them suddenly, often when you have been hoping to see them.
example: She caught sight of her cousin in the crowd.
persian: ناگهان دیدن، چشمش به چیزی افتادن

definition: to see them suddenly, especially when they are hard to see.
example: I spotted several mistakes in my work.

definition: rub or knead the body’s muscles.
example: Massage the scalp vigorously.

definition: move your hand over the skin, hair, etc. gently and slowly.
example: gently stroking the whole face.

definition: move or make sth move easily over a smooth or wet surface.
example: sliding steadily up and over the forehead.

definition: press on sth hard with your hand, foot, etc.
example: Apply gentle pressure to the temples.

definition: make a part of the body or skin more active.
example: Stimulate the skin by gently patting the cheeks.

definition: touch sth lightly several times with your hand flat.
example: gently patting the cheeks.

definition: hold sth tightly between the thumb and finger.
example: lightly pinch the skin along the line of the jaw.

definition: the feeling you have if your muscles are tight and not relaxed (release the tension = allow or cause the muscles to relax).
example: To release tension around the eyes.

definition: press sth firmly with your fingers.
example: firmly squeeze the eyebrows with your fingertips.

definition: describe soft, relaxed movements.
example: Start by gently stroking the whole face.

definition: describe soft, relaxed movements.
example: Use your fingertips to lightly pinch the skin.

definition: with much stronger force.
example: firmly squeeze the eyebrows.

definition: regular, controlled movements.
example: sliding steadily up and over the forehead.

definition: in a very energetic and active way. SYN energetically.
example: Massage the scalp vigorously.

definition: light and pleasant. SYN subtle.
example: What a delicate flavour/fragrance.

definition: a pleasant smell. fragrant ADJ.
example: What a delicate fragrance.

definition: just possible to smell, see, or hear.
example: It has a faint smell of pear.

definition: making you feel hungry. OPP unappetizing.
example: lots of appetizing recipes.

definition: If your mouth waters, you produce saliva and want to eat. mouth-watering ADJ.
example: The smells... were making my mouth water.
persian: آب دهان راه افتادن، هوس کردن

definition: a pleasant, distinctive smell.
example: The aroma of fresh coffee.

definition: not having much taste. SYN bland.
example: This soup is insipid.

definition: very strong smelling.
example: Garlic has a pungent smell.

definition: smelling unpleasant or damp; without freshness. SYN dank.
example: The house has a musty odour.

definition: a smell, especially an unpleasant one.
example: The house has a musty odour.

definition: very unpleasant. SYN disgusting.
example: This fish smells revolting.

definition: (of food and drink) go bad and be unfit to eat or drink.
example: I think it's gone off.

definition: making you feel you want to vomit.
example: a nauseating stench in the basement.

definition: a strong, very unpleasant smell.
example: a nauseating stench in the basement.
